paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant p.307_308del, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: Long QT syndrome and sinoatrial node dysfunction

individual_records.phenotype_details: suffered from LQTS since five years old, experienced repeated convulsions and occasional syncope
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The proband (II: 1) was diagnosed with LQTS and thus selected to conduct WES in this family.

functional_data.summary: KCNH2 p.307_308del affects the single-stranded RNA folding, resulting in a false regional double helix and reduced structural stability.

variants.segregation_data: KCNH2 p.307_308del was found as a de novo mutation in II: 1; other family members did not carry the mutation.
variants.evidence_level: strong evidence based on functional impact and segregation analysis
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was validated as positive by Sanger sequencing.
key_quotes: KCNH2 p.307_308del was considered as de novo mutation in II: 1.
The heterozygous SCN5A p.R1865H was carried by I: 1 and II: 2, but not carried by I: 2.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
